name: v1-adult-mouse-brain-1-1-0
title: Mouse Brain Section (Coronal)
description:
10x Genomics obtained fresh frozen mouse brain tissue from [BioIVT](https://bioivt.com) Asterand. The tissue was embedded and cryosectioned as described in Visium Spatial Protocols - Tissue Preparation Guide Demonstrated Protocol ([CG000240](https://support.10xgenomics.com/spatial-gene-expression/sample-prep/doc/demonstrated-protocol-visium-spatial-protocols-tissue-preparation-guide#header)). Tissue sections of 10 µm thickness from a slice of the coronal plane were placed on Visium Gene Expression slides, then stained following the Methanol Fixation, H&E Staining & Imaging Demonstrated Protocol ([CG000160](https://support.10xgenomics.com/spatial-gene-expression/sample-prep/doc/demonstrated-protocol-methanol-fixation-hande-staining-and-imaging-for-visium-spatial-protocols)).

* Sex: Male
* Age: >8 weeks
* Strain: C57BL/6
* Section Orientation: Coronal

The slide was coverslipped and the H&E image acquired using a Nikon Ti2-E microscope with the following settings:

- Color camera
- 10X objective
- Numerical Aperture: 0.45
- Exposure: 2 ms
- Gain: 4.5X

The Visium Spatial Gene Expression libraries were prepared following the Visium Spatial Gene Expression Reagent Kits User Guide ([CG000239](/support/spatial-gene-expression-fresh-frozen/documentation/steps/library-construction/visium-spatial-gene-expression-reagent-kits-user-guide) Rev A).

* Sequencing instrument: Illumina NovaSeq 6000
* Sequencing depth: 115,569 reads per spot
* Sequencing configuration: Paired-end (28 X 90), Dual-Indexed Sequencing. Read 1: 28bp read 1 (16bp Visium spatial barcode, 12bp UMI), Read 2: 120bp (transcript), 10bp i7 sample barcode and 10bp i5 sample barcode
* Dual-index set T1T2-E3
* Slide: V19L01-041
* Area: C1

Key cell metrics were:

- Spots detected under tissue - 2,702
- Median UMI counts per spot - 28,944
- Median genes per spot - 6,018
